info.name: VSTS Instance Local
info.description: Collection of requests that look at a VSTS project

item.name: Get fields for a work item type

request.description: Retrieves all the fields that are configured for a specific work item type (e.g. Bug, Product Backlog Item, Feature, Epic)
Retrieves the configuration of the fields across the collection that can be used within records

item.name: Id specific requests
Get Specific Work Items with History

request.description: Returns all the details for a specific work item including every change that has been made since it was created

Retrieves all the current information for a work item

**Notes**
* To retrieve the information as it was at a particular point in time add the *asOf* query string parameter. For e.g. asOf=2018-08-01
* The *ids* parameter can accept a comma separated list of ids - up to a maximum of 200 ids

Retrieves all the current information for a work item

**Notes**
* To retrieve the information as it was at a particular point in time add the *asOf* query string parameter. For e.g. asOf=2018-08-01
* The *ids* parameter can accept a comma separated list of ids - up to a maximum of 200 ids

item.name: Get all changes for a specific release

request.description:
Lists all the work items that have changed since the specified release id

*baseReleaseId* of 364 is the  release that was active in JUne 2018
Release 462 is the July 2018  release

**This request requires READ access to Work Items AND Releases**

item.description: These requests rely on a specific work item identifier so they will need to be manually updated if the collection configuration variables change
